original_text: Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.
korean_text: 또 그들이 각기 직무를 따라 말과 준마에게 먹일 보리와 꼴을 그 말들이 있는 곳으로 가져왔더라

sentences.original_text: Barley also and straw for the horses
and dromedaries brought they unto the place
every man according to his charge
